TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit PrintStringProperty extends System.Printing.IndexedProperties.PrintProperty
Public NotInheritable Class PrintStringProperty Inherits PrintProperty

summary.span: 表示打印系统硬件或软件组件的 属性（及其值）。

span.span: Represents a property (and its value) of a printing system hardware or software component.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此类在其属性中安装仅在位置、端口和共享状态中不同于现有打印机的第二台打印机。The following example shows how to use this class to install a second printer that differs in its properties from an existing printer only in location, port, and shared status. [!code-csharp[ClonePrinter#ClonePrinter](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ClonePrinter/CSharp/Program.cs#cloneprinter)] [!code-vb[ClonePrinter#ClonePrinter](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ClonePrinter/visualbasic/program.vb#cloneprinter)]

span.span: The name of the property that the represents.

summary.span: 为指定的属性初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for the specified property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的`attributeName`拼写应与打印系统对象的某些特定属性的名称相同, 包括大小写。The `attributeName` should be spelled exactly the same as the name of some particular property of a print system object, including casing. 例如, 对象的属性必须为 "提交者", 而不是 "提交者"。For example, the property of a object must be spelled "Submitter", not "submitter".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的`attributeName`拼写应与打印系统对象的某些特定属性的名称相同, 包括大小写。The `attributeName` should be spelled exactly the same as the name of some particular property of a print system object, including casing. 例如, 对象的属性必须为 "提交者", 而不是 "提交者"。For example, the property of a object must be spelled "Submitter", not "submitter". ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此构造函数在位置、端口和共享状态中安装在其属性中不同于现有打印机的第二台打印机。The following example shows how to use this constructor to install a second printer that differs in its properties from an existing printer only in location, port, and shared status. [!code-csharp[ClonePrinter#ClonePrinter](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ClonePrinter/CSharp/Program.cs#cloneprinter)] [!code-vb[ClonePrinter#ClonePrinter](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ClonePrinter/visualbasic/program.vb#cloneprinter)]
